keyword: how many calories is in grilled cheese
title: How Many Calories in Grilled Cheese?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in grilled cheese, including a standard sandwich's full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in Grilled Cheese?
assumptions: Standard grilled cheese: 2 slices white bread, 2 slices cheddar cheese, 1 tbsp butter for grilling; no extras like tomato or bacon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, cheese brand, butter amount, and cooking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard grilled cheese sandwich has about 350 kcal, with 15 g protein and 20 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white
Low-fat cheese and no butter (dry grill)

faqs.q: How many calories is in grilled cheese sandwich?
faqs.a: About 350 kcal for a standard one with white bread, cheddar, and butter.

faqs.q: What's the protein in grilled cheese?
faqs.a: Around 15 g, mostly from the cheese.

faqs.q: Does grilled cheese have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 800 mg due to cheese and bread.

faqs.q: How to make grilled cheese lower in calories?
faqs.a: Opt for low-fat cheese, whole grain bread, and skip or reduce butter.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in grilled cheese?
faqs.a: Yes, about 30 g from the bread, with 2 g fiber.
